title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Simulation Training: Expert Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational job-related knowledge and experience using simulation tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve a performance efficiency improvement of 1 minute saved per target time across three consecutive simulation training sessions.
Learners maintain an 85%+ task completion rate using normative comparative feedback.
Learners progressively master five core job tasks following a sequential practice schedule.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
